feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:18 a.m. NDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 11:30 AM NDT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: E 34 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except 13 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area late this afternoon. High plus 5 except 13 north of Cape Ray. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Showers beginning overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 1 May 2023
